dmca.title: Infringing reposts of articles on web page
dmca.body:
Apr 04 06 03:56p
	p.1
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints Google, Inc.
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
(650) 963-3255
April 2, 2006

Dear Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints:

I am contacting you to file a notice of Copyright Infringement.
1.	It has come to my attention that an unauthorized use of my copyrighted article titled "General Guidelines for Safe Sex" has appeared on several websites. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears at http://vvww.allsexquide.com/safesex.htm
In visiting the following webpages, it is clear that my article was simply copied and pasted into their website, word for word.
2.	Search Query: ann andriani 
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.lustandloveonline.com/guidelines for safe sex.html
3.	My contact information is the following: Andrea Ferrier (A.K.A. Ann Andriani) 
1529 Yarrow Circle
Bellport, NY 11713
Phone: 631-803-0883
Email: ann@allsexquide.com
4.	Owners/Administrators of the allegedly infringing webpages:
Administrative Contact::
Registration Hostmaster: admin@wisol.com
430051 Canada Inc. BP 802 succ B
Montreal, Quebec H3B-3K5 CA
Phone:: (514) 398-9994
5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank you very much for looking into this matter for me. Please feel free to contact me with any questions.

Sincerely,

Andrea Ferrier
AKA Ann Andriani
ann@allsexguide.com
